# Index

  >>> fruit = "Mangosteen"
  >>> fruit[1:4]
  'ang'

  >>> fruit[:5]
  'Mango'

  >>> fruit[5:]
  'steen'

  >>> fruit[:5] + fruit[5:]
  'Mangosteen'
